title: Pixel 4 Screen flickering
content:
I've reviewed previous answers already. I bought a pixel 4 and the first day I immediately saw the flickering. I got the lastest update and the flickering continues. I don't have the device anymore so I can't test solutions.

I don't think these questions are answered yet:
1. Does it happen to all devices or some?
2. The latest update didn't solve the issue, why not? Does it mean it's a hardware problem?
3. Is it really a solution to lock the refresh rate to 90hz?

Thank you
